org.ligoj.app.resource.node

Class AbstractLockedResource<I extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.node.AbstractLockedResource<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Identifier type of locked resource.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeResource, SubscriptionResource

    public abstract class AbstractLockedResource<I extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for resource that can be locked.

      • deleteTasks

        public void deleteTasks(org.ligoj.app.api.ServicePlugin plugin,
                        I id)
        Delete all tasks related the given entity and check there is no running tasks.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The related resource plug-in managing the entity being deleted.
        id - The entity's identifier being deleted.

      • deleteWithTasks

        public void deleteWithTasks(java.lang.String node,
                            I id,
                            boolean deleteRemoteData)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete all tasks related the given entity and check there is no running tasks.
        Parameters:
        node - The related node's identifier owning the locked resource.
        id - The entity's identifier being deleted.
        deleteRemoteData - When true, remote data will be also destroyed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
